name: virtualcricket
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual cricket
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This game is same like hand cricket game which we play with our friends during our school days.
To start, just say "Alexa launch virtual cricket" or "Alexa, open virtual cricket".
Follow the instructions from Alexa and enjoy the game.
At any time , you can restart the game by saying "Alexa, restart".
Also if you want to exit the game any time, say "Alexa, exit"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
